concept.title: Kafka Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka Consumer reads data from a Kafka cluster and processes the data based on the type of data stored in the cluster. You can use the Kafka Consumer to read text, delimited, JSON, and XML data from a Kafka cluster. You can also use the Kafka Consumer to read files generated by other pipelines.

conbody.p: Kafka Consumer originovervieworiginsKafka ConsumerWhen you configure a Kafka Consumer, you configure the consumer group name, topic, and ZooKeeper connection information. You can add additional Kafka configuration properties as needed.
When you start a pipeline, the Kafka Consumer becomes a new consumer group for the topic and starts reading data from the topic based on the offset provided by the ZooKeeper.

The Kafka Consumer processes data from all partitions in the topic. It saves the offset with the ZooKeeper after passing data to destinations. Still need to add log data format details for this origin.
